00067     typedef enum tNetPacketIdentifier{
00077       NPI_GEN_IDENT     = 0x0000,
00078 
00084       NPI_FLOOD_0004    = 0x1000,
00085 
00095       NPI_SVR_CONRESP   = 0x4000,
00096 
00103       NPI_INVALID       =0xFFFF
00104     };
00105 
00109     typedef union npPacketBaseData{
00111       struct {
00119         guint16 packetIdentifier;
00120       };
00122       enet_uint8 data[2];
00123     };
00124 
00155     class NetPacketBase{
00156     public:

00159       ~NetPacketBase();

00168

00182       virtual enet_uint8* getData(){};

00190       virtual size_t getDataLength(){};
00191 
00192       void send();
00193       tNetPacketIdentifier getIdentifier();
00194 
00195       const char* typeToString(tNetPacketIdentifier);
00196 
00197       void setReliable(bool);

00199

00201

00212
